## Aufgabe: LONGLEY

### Analysemodell

```{r fig_1, echo=FALSE}
DiagrammeR::grViz("
digraph {
  graph [layout = circo]
  node [shape = circle]
    A [label = 'GNP.deflator']
    B [label = 'GNP']
    C [label = 'Unemployed']
    D [label = 'Armed.Forces']
    E [label = 'Population']
    F [label = 'Year']
    G [label = 'Employed']
  edge []
    A -> B
    B -> C
    G -> C
    D -> C
    D -> G
    F -> E
    E -> B
    G -> B
    E -> G
}
")
```

### Univariate Analyse

````{r table_1, echo=TRUE}
summary(longley)
````

### Bivariate Analyse

````{r fig_2, echo=TRUE}
library(corrplot)
corrmatrix <- cor(longley)
corrplot.mixed(corrmatrix)
````

### Multivariate Analyse

````{r table_2, echo=TRUE}
summary(lm(Unemployed~GNP + Armed.Forces + Employed, data=longley))
````
